mapper.select: SELECT u.`nickname` AS nickname,u.`icon_url` AS icon_url,c.`comment_body` AS comment_body,c.`time_stamp` AS time_stamp FROM t_comment c JOIN t_user u ON c.`user_id`=u.`user_id` WHERE group_id=#{groupId} ORDER BY time_stamp DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_collect WHERE user_id =#{userId} AND group_id=#{groupId}
mapper.select: SELECT g.*,i.image_url image_url,i.width width,i.height height,l.level level FROM t_group g JOIN t_collect c ON g.id=c.group_id JOIN t_image i ON g.image_id=i.id JOIN t_level l ON g.`level_id`=l.`id` WHERE c.user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: update t_user set struts='1' where username=#{username}
mapper.select: select p.permissionName from t_user u,t_role r,t_permission p where u.roleId=r.id and p.roleId=r.id and u.userName=#{userName}
